description: Try our easy to follow Popcorn Three Ways recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Popcorn Three Ways Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 tsp sea salt flakes (save 1/2 tsp sea salt flakes)

recipeInstructions.text: Regular: Heat 2 tbs olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add cup popping corn and cover with a tight-fitting lid. Cook, shaking pan occasionally, for 3-5 minutes or until corn is popped. Transfer to a large bowl and season with 1 tsp sea salt flakes.

Choc drizzle: Make popcorn. Lay half the popcorn onto a tray lined with baking paper. Melt 200g dark chocolate in a bowl over simmering water. Add tsp sea salt flakes, if desired. Drizzle over popcorn and leave until set.

Salted caramel: Make popcorn. Lay half the popcorn onto a tray lined with baking paper. Combine 1 cup brown sugar, a pinch of sea salt and 2 tbs water in a small saucepan. Stir over medium-low heat until sugar has dissolved. Bring to the boil. Add tsp vanilla extract. Stir and remove from heat. Cool for 2 minutes. Drizzle over popcorn. Cool.
